languages.text: "Напрасно вы ко мне не прислушались, Вольный Торговец. Нам всем придется заплатить за эту ошибку".
"You should have listened to me, Rogue Trader. We will all have to pay for this mistake."
languages.original_text: "Напрасно вы ко мне не прислушались, Вольный Торговец. Нам всем придется заплатить за эту ошибку".

traits.locale_text: "You should have listened to me, Rogue Trader. We will all have to pay for this mistake."
"You should have listened to me, Rogue Trader. We will all have to pay for this mistake."
"You should have listened to me, Rogue Trader. We will all have to pay for this mistake."
"You should have listened to me, Rogue Trader. We will all have to pay for this mistake."
"You should have listened to me, Rogue Trader. We will all have to pay for this mistake."

languages.text: "Ihr hättet auf mich hören sollen, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Wir werden für diesen Fehler alle bezahlen müssen."
languages.original_text: "You should have listened to me, Rogue Trader. We will all have to pay for this mistake."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr hättet auf mich hören sollen, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Wir werden für diesen Fehler alle bezahlen müssen."

languages.text: « Vous auriez dû m'écouter, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Nous aurons tous à payer le prix de cette erreur. »
languages.original_text: "You should have listened to me, Rogue Trader. We will all have to pay for this mistake."

traits.locale_text: « Vous auriez dû m'écouter, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Nous aurons tous à payer le prix de cette erreur. »

languages.text: “你本该听从我的建议，行商浪人。看来我们都要为这个错误付出代价了。”
languages.original_text: "You should have listened to me, Rogue Trader. We will all have to pay for this mistake."

traits.locale_text: “你本该听从我的建议，行商浪人。看来我们都要为这个错误付出代价了。”

languages.text: 「我の話を聞き入れた方がいいですよ、自由開拓者。全員が過ちの代償を払うことになります」
languages.original_text: "You should have listened to me, Rogue Trader. We will all have to pay for this mistake."

traits.locale_text: 「俺の言うことを聞いた方がいい、自由開拓者。全員が過ちの代償を払ことになるぞ」
「我の話を聞き入れた方がいいですよ、自由開拓者。全員が過ちの代償を払うことになります」

languages.text: «Debería haberme hecho caso, Comerciante Independiente. Todos pagaremos por este error».
languages.original_text: "You should have listened to me, Rogue Trader. We will all have to pay for this mistake."

traits.locale_text: «Debería haberme hecho caso, Comerciante Independiente. Todos pagaremos por este error».

languages.text: "Beni dinlemeliydin Hür Tacir. Bu hatanın bedelini hep birlikte ödeyeceğiz."
languages.original_text: "You should have listened to me, Rogue Trader. We will all have to pay for this mistake."

traits.locale_text: "Beni dinlemeliydin Hür Tacir. Bu hatanın bedelini hep birlikte ödeyeceğiz."
